name: Driving Car
description:
First person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded sports car sounds.Driving Car is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for.
Tilt your device to drag your car wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new cars.

FEATURES
- First person camera view
- Endless game mode
- Easy to learn and drive
- Real motor sounds recorded from real racing
- Simulator-like controls
- Different locations and cars to choose
- Support for 3 languages
